segments.text: I can't believe how the woman is just drying dishes, not noticing the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting how the water is just pouring onto the floor, making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it's just gross how they're trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy is about to fall, and it's just awful to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, and it's just not right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is just a series of disgusting events waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still running, adding to the mess and the disgust of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, and it's hard to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, but it's just awful to see.
segments.speaker: PAR
